question:
Savage Love (Laxed - Siren Beat)    Jason Derulo, Jawsh 685
If I woke up without ya
I don't know what I would do
Thought I could be single forever
'Til I met you
Usually don't be fallin', be fallin'
, fallin' fast
You got a way of keeping me comin' back to
back
I just found out, the only reason that you lovin'
Baby I know she creepin', I feel it in the air
Every night and every day
I try to make you stay
But your Savage love
Did somebody, did somebody
Break your heart?
Lookin' like an angel
But your savage love
When you kiss me I know you don't give two
f**ks
but I still want that ...
me
Was to get back at your ex-lover but before you
leave Usually I would never, would never even
care
48. What happen if the singer wakes up without his girl?
A. He will be lazy to wake up
B. He could be single forever
C. He usually doesn't fall fast
D. He doesn't know what will he do
49. What is the only reason the girl loves the singer?
A. To take money and fame
B. To get back to her ex-lover
C. To know that he is creeping
D. To make him feel it in the air
50.. Why does the girl have a savage love?
A. She loves to play victim
B. The man doesn't really care
C. Someone broke the girl's heart
D. They are not mean to each other.​

answers.answer:
48. D. He doesn't know what will he do

49. C. To know that he is creeping

50. C. Someone broke the girl's heart

48. D
49. D
50. C
I think it’s not correct answer

answers.answer:

B. Hibernate

related_questions.question:
Arrange the words into good sentence

tolong di jawab 
​
Susunlah kalimat ini dengan benar.1.write down three adjectives !2.write down three named of clothes !3.write down four seasons !4.write down three named public places !5.write down three hobbies !

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. - carry, catch, throw

2.- pants, shirts, socks

3.- summer, rainy, snowy, and dry season

4.- mall, market, mini market

5.- football, swimming, cycling

maaf jika kurang pas
